name: Blue bike
description: Get ready for a fun ride with this green bike! Its vibrant color and sporty design make it an ideal choice for adventurous kids. With its sturdy frame, comfortable seat, and easy-grip handles, this toy bike ensures an enjoyable and safe biking experience. Let the pedals spin and embark on exciting outdoor escapades with this fantastic green bike.
